1411150.name: Turret Defense: Bug Invasion
1411150.description:
Man the turrets! Bugs are invading Earth and you're the only one left to stop them in this arcade-style endless game. Chase high scores as you use the mouse to aim the turret from a top-down perspective against different types of bugs. Just don't get overwhelmed in Turret Defense: Bug Invasion!

Features:
  • Arcade-Style Gameplay Loop
  • Wave-Based Progression
  • Bugs
  • Rockin' Tunes
1411150.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
